title: Critical Thinking-Based Educational Newsroom Design and Operational Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic journalism practice experience and media production technical skills
context.additional_context: Corporate in-service retraining program for current practitioners, featuring team-based projects in digitally equipped physical spaces

learning_goals: They can design an educational newsroom operation model and derive at least three critical surplus elements.
They can complete simulation tasks reflecting real-world journalism environments with over 80% accuracy.
They can propose improvements to the newsroom operation process through peer evaluations at least twice.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
